text: Great karting time! very good instalations and service. Nice indoor racetrack and lap times sheet at the end!
Great architecture, with a very friendly and enthousiastic guide. A must see for anyone interested in 20th century architecture.
Nice field/space available to play some football (soccer) and can then treat yourself to a nice cafe and some apple pie! lekker!

Nieuw Dakota is a new gallery in the very up and coming Amsterdam Noord. It is a large warehouse space for contemporary art. I visited last week, and they are currently showing an exhibition called 'New Saint Petersburg', showing work by several young artists from the Russian city. The exhibition has interesting paintings, tender photographic portraits, video installations and interactive pieces. Many of them are innately political pieces, challenging the perception of modern Russia in the throws of political change, and all are for sale. The space itself is very open and bright, situated right next to the N.S.D.M ferry port, a free ride from Central Station. The area is great to visit, and I had a wonderful time exploring all of the surrounding warehouse buildings and unique bars. This gallery is definitely worth a visit for its array of exhibitions and its fantastic location, and entry is free!

Dit is inderdaad de beste in Amsterdam en omstreken, je kan ook makkelijk een aanhangertje zand afhalen voor een euro of zeven meen ik, echt geen geld en er is er geen een goedkoper. Succes met afhalen, die gouden kikkers kunnen er wat van.
Ongelooflijk creatieve kunstenares en prachtig atelier aan het water, absolute aanrader!
Super voordelig deskundig en vrij parkeren .. een aanrader.
Great gymnasia and other sporting facilities
Een zeer leuke sfeer binnen de sportschool! Vriendelijke personeel en verschillende soorten apparaten, ook is de sportschool goed te bereiken met het openbare vervoer. Een aanrader dus!

Goede apparatuur, schoon, goede sfeer! Perfect als je van goed trainen houdt in een gezellige, persoonlijke sfeer...Parnatta apparatuur, met extra gewicht erop, schijven t/m 45kg, dumbells t/m 50kg...Ik train er al een aantal jaren en nooit gedacht aan switchen naar andere sportscholen...
Wonderful cinema that has not changed in 20 (or maybe 100?) years with squeaking parts and 60s carpet.
Absolutely wonderful. My favourite cinema - in a beautiful building. And they also do a nice glass of wine.

Naast alle 'gewone' sportschooldingen die goed zijn voor de mens, vind ik het heel bijzonder dat Shape ook gelegenheid geeft om mij en Petra geld op te laten halen voor de Alpe d'HuZes. We hebben inmiddels vier spinningmarthonnetjes georganiseerd in Shape en daarmee al ca. € 1000,- opgehaald. Alles voor het goede doel, Shape gaf ons gratis de ruimte. Dank je wel.

Hoewel ik zelf in Shape werk wil ik toch even laten weten dat ik het de fijnste sportschool vind waar je terecht kan komen, en weet ik uit ervaring hoeveel waarde er wordt gehecht aan hygiene, aanbod en vooral gezelligheid :)
Best Squash Club in the world
Een hele fijne sportschool met goede apparatuur, nette sauna, vriendelijk personeel en leuke medesporters. Kom hier al meer dan 10 jaar met plezier fitnessen en squashen.

Zeer ruime voorzieningen, goede prijs. Fijn: per maand opzegbaar! Of als je nog meer flexibiliteit wil, dan koop je een strippenkaart. Vriendelijke en professionele instructeurs en bediening. En een prima sauna ook nog. Al meer dan een jaar zeer tevreden hier!
Perfecte begeleiding, Vriendelijke mensen, Centraal gelegen. Top.
Excellent exibition "Moments of Travel" photographs by Anthony Cassidy lovely gallery and inspiring images from around the world.
Waaaaanzinnig park, doldwaze draaimolens, glibberige glijbanen en goed parkeren!
ik kan zit er nu al een paar maanden, maar heb nog niks te klagen, gratis kluisjes etc, en als je zin hebt, kan je ook af en toe een baantje trekken. is ook wel s leuk. groet
Beautiful park. Good place to relax and have your lunch
Heerlijk rustig en groen park. Een oase van rust unlike het vondelpark
Best gallery/cinema ever!
Amusement, charming, something weird and unique! I recommend to anyone who's visiting Amsterdam! Entrance is amazingly cheap - €4
cool place to laugh, extremely funny

Argos is the oldest leather bar in the world and one of the most popular in Amsterdam. the bartenders are friendly and the atmosphere is relaxed and sexually charged. I have been visiting the Argos for years and always had a good time. The first bar in Amsterdam to give free condoms.
This lovely hotel / hostel has something for everyone and is full of character and laughter. Tasty food, excellent staff, great rooms for all budgets - perfect!
Amsterdam's longest Happy Hour!

Hou van je gezelligheid tijdens het sporten? En wil je niet behandeld worden als een 'nummertje' maar het juiste advies krijgen voor je doelstelling? Dan ben je bij HCJ toch echt aan het juiste adres. Gezelligheid, vriendelijke service zowel de receptie als in de fitness, super omgeving (de Jordaan), passende begeleiding, het is er netjes, licht en je kan er van alles en nog wat doen. Van fitness tot sauna, van kickboxen tot yoga. Oh, en je kan zelfs een week lang proefdraaien. Nou, wat wil je nog meer?
Beste health club van Amsterdam! Hele goede sfeer, sociaal en gezellig personeel. Leuke lessen en het is er schoon! Ik misschien bevooroordeeld omdat ik hier al twee jaar werk met veel plezier :-)

I've dreamed about visiting this museum for many years. Fortunately, my dream came true. Wonderful place! All the wax exhibits are so realistic! It left huge impression on me. I'll definitely visit it again at the next opportunity.
That was my first museum visited in Amsterdam, a lot of figures to see, a lot of pictures to take. Recommend
Cool I Liked To Come Back Again!
Mondriaan and history of Amsterdam. Impressive and interesting. Only 10 €.
A guy in our group got picked 3 times in a row to be tortured. Great laugh.
Good place
It was all up and runnin wen we were there and its well worth a look :-)
Learned a lot
Très belle boutique de design avec à l'étage un café très beau, accueillant, carte variée et plats goûteux!
Leuk en ook nog eens handige design spullen (ook lang niet altijd duur!)

In my mind one of the best tattoo artists in Amsterdam. The shop is lovely, somewhere to feel comfortable - not a cliche-riffic dark den with penises in formaldehyde (eg hanky panky). Rosana, the owner, really takes her time and puts a lot of love into the custom designs she makes after a consultation. She has a great style, a fusion of tradition and great use of vibrant colors. Very good fine line work. I've also seen some really amazing cover ups that she's done. All in all very highly recommended. Forget all the big names, and go here. You'll be glad you did!
The best place for graphic design books

A good way to discover science for kind. Anyway it was enough amusing experience for me. The exposes were very interesting as well as the practical things. The stuff was very attentive and would help with any question. The building is also very well structured. There is a breathtaking view from the top. Interesting day out for both kids and adults.

Most novel museum experience I've had in Amsterdam. Excellent use of technology to make the experience more immersive. Virtual ocean tours and beautiful old ships. Highlight was the real life revival of an old warship which you can explore.

Awesome museum. Worth a visit if only for the centuries old building and spectacular glass roof. Here you can really feel the Dutch history. Exhibitions are located in tasteful interiors which haven't been packed with objects. This museum shows how fairly dry stuff can be presented in an inspiring way for every visitor. Restaurant is good too, terrace is great spot for lunch.
Loved this place! Sure I had just had some space cake, but wow! Love how interactive it is and their use of technology

Amazing museum, that includes the finest 17th century building of all of the Netherlands: the Portuguese Synagogue. Impressive shows (at this moment Saul Leiter, an undiscovered master photographer) and beautiful permanent exhibition.
Well thought out and plenty of info in English too!

Hartelijke mensen bij de receptie, nette (gratis garderobe met kluisjes) goed en zeer informatief museum. De audiotoer zorgt ervoor dat alle informatie gedoseerd bij je binnen komt. Je bent zo een middag kwijt en na de tijd raad ik het aan om in het naastliggende café even een kop koffie te nemen want het museum is soms wel heftig.
We went Frid after arriving 11.30ish, staff were fantastic and friendly, the club filled shortly after one and the punters seemed happy and lively will definatley go back again. Brill night x x x
Gorgeous location, good drinks, really doesn't feel like you're in the middle of the city.
Zo leuk om in t kleinste museum te staan...je ziet alles al door de rwmen van buitenaf, maar de extra dimensie van binnen staan maakt t af! De activiteiten er om heen geven n geweldige sfeer extra
het is leuk om te voetballen.
Best gym in the city and also in the country.

Al 25 jaar kom ik hier met veel plezier 4x per week ondanks het feit dat ik via mijn werk bij de GGD gratis kan sporten bij Fitness First. Brightside is een wereld van verschil als je het vergelijkt met zo'n grote sportschool als Fitness First. Hier krijg je nog persoonlijke aandacht. De kwaliteit van de lessen is goed: ik bodyshape bij Conchita, step en yoga bij Sita en Bianca en pump bij Eudia en de lessen zijn stuk voor stuk goed. Na de lessen lekker in de sauna en daarna koffie! Wat ook zo prettig is dat als je klachten hebt even langs de fysiotherapeuten: Anne, Sofie en Maartje kan. Kortom: een kleine, leuke en kwalitatieve goede sportschool

Brightside; de gezelligste sportschool van oud-west!! Ze hebben een divers les aanbod: Body Attack, Body Pump, Bodyshape, Power Step, Fat Burning Step, Step & Shape, Power Yoga, Yin Yoga, Pilates, Boksen & Pole Fitness!Alle ingrediënten zijn aanwezig om daadwerkelijk te werken aan een gezonder lichaam en daarmee indirect een gezonde geest! Brightside Fitness & Fysio beschikt over ervaren, professionele instructeurs en fysiotherapeuten die een luisterend oor hebben en die de programma's persoonlijk op jouw afstemmen. Daardoor heb je nooit het gevoel te worden opgejaagd en kan je in je eigen tempo je schema's afwerken. Dat geeft rust en een goed gevoel.
Kleine beginnende aquarium en paladarium winkel. Assortiment is nog niet heel groot maar de prijzen zijn erg netjes en de kwaliteit van de dieren is super! Eigenaar is erg deskundig.
A gorgeous and romantic park that you have to take a walk or bike ride in if visiting Amsterdam.

Great park to relax in or pass by on your bike. This park is very popular and the part closer to Amsterdam city it's more packed with groups of people sitting on the blankets by the water and listening to music on their iphone while enjoying each other's company. You can bike around the park or bring kids for a fun-day in the park. Overall, don't forget your blanket or music and get there early to get a spot by the river.
Great service, lovely ladies haha
Awesome experience!!

Friendliest gym in town, relaxed and informal with a relaxed feel. I've said this to many people already so when I noticed the chance to review, thought to share you to too. Great value also with excellent off-peak rates. Highly recommend to anyone in West.

Een hele gezellige gym. Het is er klein, maar fijn. Je hebt er alles wat je nodig hebt om je persoonlijke trainingsdoeleinden te bereiken. De prijs is ook wel fijn voor de portemonnee. Verwacht geen zwembad, wifi etc., maar daarvoor ga je ook niet naar de sportschool toe. Wel grappig dat de negatieve recensies hier alleen in het Engels zijn. Volgens de algemene voorwaarden kan je gewoon een aangetekende brief sturen als je het op wilt zeggen. Zou moeten lukken lijkt mij.

Hele gezellige sportschool. Heb altijd een goed gevoel als ik binnen kom. Ik heb totaal geen problemen met de regels die de Family Gym heeft opgesteld. Het staat duidelijk in het contract en je weet precies waar je aan toe bent. Ik heb het helemaal naar mijn zin bij de Family Gym!
Een hele leuke gym, je wordt er niet lastig gevallen door vervelende mannen en de groepslessen zijn top!

Museum specialised in photography, as FOAM museum, the quality of the work is usually outstanding. I loved the large library and the gardens. A peaceful place to stay away the tourists and enjoy photography.
Excellent club, we went there on a Sunday night and the place was packed, the music and the people were awesome. You have to check this club out if you are in Amsterdam.
Always a great time here ! music and mixed international crowd !
Great guided museum/exhibit with great, knowledgable, helpful staff! Visit if you can!

Het Grachethuis is true hidden jewel of Amsterdam! An excellent museum that shows you the most important history moments of Amsterdam, using animation, visual effects, movies and sound effects. This is the first place you should visit if you are in the "out of the regular tourist routes" mood! In total of 5 rooms, you experience the growth and development of Amsterdam. allows to take a peep to everyday life in the "Golden age" and end with modern events that took place it this perfect city. In the end, you are able to roam free and explore other areas of museum. I was amazed with particular attention to details - even the tiles in the restrooms were amazing!
Great collection of modern art
This little museam is really worth to see. Collection is very beatiful and the building inside is nice
An unique experience to visit this museum. An original canal house in 16-17th style with a amazing, beautiful garden. Especially the kitchen, what a history.
This was probably my favorite part of Amsterdam. Aside from the art and just fun atmosphere of the museum, it was nice to play with the cat curators.
Awesome club, only for lovers of underground house music. Stay away if you like corny music. Loved it.
Good vibe. Always. But very hot people ;)
Excellent Club, great sound / music, friendly staff, quality atmosphere and crowd...
A visual must. Go for one of the guided tours to understand and discover all of its bizarre beauty.

This is the most state-of-the-art cinema I've ever been, especially if you happen to watch at Grande Zaal. Pathe has been artistic enough to keep the old structure and even better, make use of its prominent architecture.
Great club, Brilliant sound system and friendly staff. The card and locker situation was quite confusing but at least i knew my things were safe. Good night out.
Good and friendly service, delicious food and wine, reasonably priced. Nice interior and music. I've been twice and highly recommend it! Jennifer, 10-10-2011
Great art.
Great photo gallery. You can also purchase their publications with special offers on out of date books and mags.
Fantastic displays and an excellent Cafe great place to spend some time

Excellent museum for modern art and design. Everything was excellent the only reason I give the Service "very good" instead of "excellent" was because of the long queue to buy tickets. A big and varied collection with many famous painters. Also on the design side you can see some of the things which shape the items we have/use every day as well as a peak to some design which we might be seeing very soon mass produced and appear everywhere. All in all I really enjoyed my visit to this museum/art gallery and would recommend it to anyone going to Amsterdam.
Eclectic range of gallery displays - worth the €15/adult.
go on a friday night if you can cause its super cool to drink and ham in a museum period but van gogh is truly the ideal artist for a perfect night of art music wine and joy
Nice museum, recently renovated and very well set up, great collection very intelligently presented. Definitely worth the queue (or try the Friday night hours, much less people).
Whether you're an art and history fan or not, this museum will leave you in awe. Inspiring architecture and stunning exhibits. A must for anyone in Amsterdam.
It was an amazing experience. Worth every penny. I liked the chronological order of the expositions. Got there early and had no wait for tickets or entry. A 'must' on your visit to AMS.

I was greatly astonished not only by the wonderful collections of the paintings but also the museum architecture impressed me a lot. This museum has been closed for renovation and recently opened. Definitely worth to visit just to see a new design of the building. It's one of the best museums I've ever visited.

This is not an ordinary cinema with ordinary american blockbusters. If you like those movies skip this cinema! It's an arthouse cinema but with a great bar open untill 01.00 am and drinks can be taken into the cinema itself.
great cinema and great bar
Wat een super bioscoop met een waanzinnige programmering van mooie films, een aanwinst voor Amsterdam en plek om naar toe te blijven gaan.
Breathtaking. Also nice and quiet for a morning jog.

Ik ben altijd enorm bezig geweest met afvallen en kwam op een gegeven moment niet verder. Kreeg een tip om bij Fresh Fitness te gaan praten over "afvallen" door hormonaal te trainen en eten. Wat ik vooral geleerd heb is dat gewicht helemaal niet belangrijk is en dat het gaat om vet percentage, en ook op welke plekken. Niet met zo'n idiote weegschaal, nee gewoon met de billenbloot en een centimeter erbij! Het heeft mijn perspectief veranderd, me van mijn weegschaal obsessie afgeholpen... en het is een super sportschool met hele leuke maar vooral professionele begeleiding. Thanks xx
nice people working here - not seen them for ages but I hope to do so soon again
Quirky and substantial photo books, great owner. Always a treat to stop by.
The best place to park your car before exploring Amsterdam! Just for 8 euros you can park your car for 24h and still get up to 5 free tickets in the city tram!

Prima luxueuse sportschool met veel groepslessen (o.a. rpm, spinning, yoga, boksen, bodypump, bodycombat, core-training, loop-training) en nagenoeg alle trainingsmogelijkheden. Ook veel gekwalificeerd personeel aanwezig voor begeleiding en advies (ook een fysiotherapeut). Nette kleedkamers met gratis sauna (en tegen een kleine vergoeding zonnebank).
Geweldige ervaring! ik ben hier met mijn partner geweest voor een massage en aan de hand van een vragenlijst bepalen ze wat voor massage het beste bij je past. Allemaal heel erg Aveda. Love it!
Very nice and quite, highly recommended.
Leuke, ongedwongen sfeer en prettig sporten! Een gezellige sportschool waar je ook groepslessen kunt volgen.
Not one of the largest parks in Amsterdam but you will find it attractive if you enjoy seeing different types of well grown gardens (including a japanese one). There is also a mini golf!
great place to have a beer and watch a movie!
Leukste bios met goed café

Great clean and quiet little park. I spent a few afternoons here smoking bud and watching the dogs and geese chase each other. Wonderful people everywhere. Very clean and well maintained. What a great city!
Altijd gezellig bij de piramide
Great venue for congresses and events! Been there for a congres, amazing auditorium and beautifull marble hall!!
Wonderful college
Love this place!
Erg leuk museum. Genoeg te zien voor jong en oud. Aanrader dus.

Ik zal heel eerlijk zijn. Ik wist van het bestaan van de vereniging vanwege video opnamen die ik daar moest maken, dat terzijde dat er veel activiteiten plaats vinden was me ook duidelijk, maar dat er een museum in dat gebouw is heb ik niet geweten, maar ik zal op korte termijn dit museum bezoeken. Dat er veel op literatuur en cultuur gebied daar plaats vindt is een prestatie en dat van af opgerichting op 18 januari 1919. Geweldig ook aan alle mensen die daar jaren voor zorgen dat het nog steeds bestaat. Mijn compliment. Dhr S. Jap Tjong.
This coffeeshop sells only outdoor organic herb. Well worth the lovely walk...

Gisteravond was ik op de Avondherdenking op De Nieuwe Ooster. Ik ben er zeker 2 uur geweest. Het was voor mij de eerste keer, maar ik ben nu al van plan om volgend jaar weer te gaan. Ik was diep onder de indruk. Wat prachtig! Al die kaarsjes, speciale uitlichtingen, muziek, poezie, de namen van de overledenen van afgelopen jaar... En dat je in de vijver een lichtje met eigen tekst kon 'bijzetten'. Wat een feeerieke sfeer. Medewerkers van De Nieuwe Ooster: geweldig gedaan!
A wonderful music entetainer dj a must and lust for your patty
Delightful relaxing spot with dovecot and walled garden.
Lovely open space, great for families and dog walkers. Lots of trees, green open areas and a fantastic play park.
Exelent park free entry
Really good, friendly club :-)
Very good, worth checking out.
I rate them as very good indeed.
Great facilities. Home of Old Salvos.

A great place to get some fresh air and exercise. This is a wonderful and popular local amenity (the car parks can get pretty full on a sunny weekend). There are hills and lakes where you can picnic in the summertime, and flat grassy areas for playing games on. Down the centre is a long tarmacced walkway perfect for little ones with their first bikes. Lots of woodland to wander through, and it's a great place to go running.

This park is massive. I've had countless outings here with friends ranging from not doing the work we came to do, to having a picnic to let's go and get lost for hours. And there are just so many different places to go in the park, it makes it an ideal running location. Or great for a romantic date ;) But running here is just brilliant, the scenery is lovely, the atmosphere can be quiet in parts and lively in others and there's room for miles!

Excellent well maintained green space, with good designated play area for children of different ages, few tennis courts, basket ball, football, open-air gym, cricket pavilion, and plenty of open spaces.
It is clean and everyone from different ages can enjoy it
Lovely centre attentive staff. Clean and well maintained.
Fantastic school

Fantastic atmosphere, good bunch of honest people that enjoy their rugby. The home of Saracens rugby club, the real men in black. I happily recommend going to watch a good game on a Saturday afternoon, have good food , good drink and fantastic banter after the game.
Great club! Lovely people!

Great little park for local people to use, with a play area for toddlers and a display board giving a very interesting history of the Bury Lodge house which originally stood on this site. The park and gardens are very tidy and neat thanks to all the volunteers and gardeners.
Welcomes players of all bowling skills. A very friendly club.
Great little shop with a fantastic range of frames and options for gifts or presents..
Amazing classes. Thank you!

Fantastic place. Not only for aircraft lovers. Great expositions. Lot of interesting things to see, touch, read and learn about. You can learn a lot about RAF and the Second World War history. Quite distant from the city centre.

This is the seminal place to go to find out about tbe Royal Air Force and the history of flying. Some of the personal stories you can read are truely heart wrenching. A must see place to teach anybody about duty and self sacrifice. All school kids should go here to find out what was done for them in the name of freedom.

An amazing museum to visit a huge amount of displays. Lots to see and do interactive displays as well. Security are very professional & helpful. Having been a visitor for 36 years I have never got bored of the RAF museum & I will never will :-)
I like bolc because its nearer and engetic I like playing tennis
Excellent park. Everyone is always friendly, many activities to do. Nothing more to say just Excellent!
A great place to take pictures round year!

A great stadium to watch a great premiership rugby union team saracens, great facilities which include a 100metre bar underneath the main stadium which offers a great happy hour and drink pre order service. the food selection is awesome with a worldwide selection of food also have dominos pizza which you can get delivered to your seat at half time. it is situated in a great location if you either drive or go by train with a free shuttle bus service
Great place to play and watch rugby at many levels. Enjoyed 2 great days there this year and I hope to see many more.
Great club. Friendly people. Wonderful atmosphere. All levels are welcome at Mill Hill.
Olivia is an excellent beautician, great attention to detail and very friendly.
Very relaxing place. Just incredible massages. Olivia is like a god. And the prices are pretty acceptable as well.
Secret Paradise is a luxurious new spa in Hendon! Staff are polite and very friendly, reasonable prices and excellent service. A recommended place for all beauty treatments.
The site of the greatest rugby stadium in London.
There's a wide variety of fitness classes available here that are not only really good for you but they're great fun and very reasonably priced.
Been a member for 2 months now and it's one of the best gyms I've used. Machines are modern, staff are friendly and the atmosphere is great.
I have been using Friary Park for 22 years It has always been a well maintained park with no trouble

Geri is great ! I can not recommend her enough . The beauty room is situated in the gym , once you step in to the room you forget where you are there is a wonderful ambiance. I get all my beauty treatments done with Geri , facials , nails , waxing etc . The prices are very good and the products are wonderful . Geri also knows her stuff about the products and the treatments . I can not say enough good things !! every time i go the whole experience is relaxing and I come out feeling relaxed and refreshed
I had a full body massage , which was really relaxing and helped to ease my neck and shoulder tension for several days. Highly recommended!

I cannot reccomend the beauty room highly enough. Its a fantastic little place inside the Fittness First gym in north finchley. I paid £25 for a half hour back massage and I can honestly say that I have never had such a great treatment. Very relaxing and excellent value for money! Well done to the beauty room!

A small fitness and personal training studio focusing on powerplate exercises. Sean (the owner) is a top guy, really makes everyone feel welcome. Sessions are one-to-one unless you wish to bring a training partner, and Sean will put together an exercise programme for you based on what you want to achieve. Prices are very reasonable for what you get and after attending a couple of times a week for about 2 months I am already seeing proper results.
Lovely park with great views of London, formal gardens, green gym, community orchard and more open space than I expected. Well worth wandering over the north circular for.
This is my local park and I have grown up all my life in the local areas. Many fond memories of games of football and walks.
It's a really lovely park, a lake with fish and ducks, a nice cafe, a lovely playground, an adventure playground in the woods, fold course. We go there regularly...

I have been a member of Paramount gym for about fourteen months now and was extremely happy when they opened because there isnt really any other nice gyms in the local area that are affordable. I just find that everyone is so lovely and friendly and genuinely concerned with your progress and wellbeing, it helps to keep you motivated! The gym is so clean and modernised providing all the equipement i could possibly need. I have never been to a gym that provides such a vast array of classes! I do kickboxing, body combat, bellydancing, spinning and zumba just to name a few.... One more bonus that i have to mention is all the discounts you recieve being a member, three free personal training sessions and free guests passes. Really good value for money.

Amazing cinema ! They are showing new and classic films, which is really great. The interior is amazing - as the theatres in the 1920s. There is a nice cafe upstairs with a little balcony and few wooden tables. Attentive staff and reasonable prices.
beautiful art deco style building, with very intimate atmosphere, best films shown that tastefully selected

The Phoenix cinema is East Finchley is definitely the right place to visit if you are looking for a unique experience. Most of the movies are in different languages . The inside Art Deco decoration is an excellent example of the splendour in North London. I recommend to have a coffee or a glass or red wine there while you enjoy your movie.

This lovely little gallery space serves the best coffee in Muswell Hill! Wonderful exhibitions by local artists, cool events and amazing prints for sale. Neighboured by two of great vintage shops. Avenue Mews is the creative hub of Muswell Hill!
Delightful views of London! Lots on offer here. Whether you're a runner, here for a picnic, playing a bit of mini-golf or just saying "hi" to the deer, you're bound to find something you like.
Love it
Fantastic views across the city.
A great view of the city

Great park in the heart of Haringey. Feels like an area loved by the locals and the evidence of community-led projects are all over it. New to the area so coming across the model transport area was rather surprising - well worth the cycle ride just to see that.
Park has had lots of investment. Much better than it had been. Will accommodate most families. Great to see that it is busy and used.

As a jogger I'm always looking for new places to work out and I recently ventured out to Lordship Rec. I was really surprised by the amount of green space here, and how beautiful it was, and an amazing job has been done on its recent improvements. The cycle path with its carefully landscaped rolling hills and miniature road signs has a real 'model village' feel that's absolutely charming, and the sheer size of the park makes it a great urban oasis.

I've been coming here for years and I would definitely continue to do so. Huge screens, comfortable seats and high-quality sound. I think the prices are also good and the service is always great. Highly recommend it.
This is my favorite local cinema. The screens are big enough and the quality of the sound is great. The seats are also comfortable and the prices are reasonable. Highly recommend it.

I had been visiting the gym for about 1,5 years. What I can say is that it changed my life in terms of fitness and good friendship. The training had always been great. The hard-working, but friendly, atmosphere in the gym helped me to go through the stages of training with easiness and confidence whilst instructing me with good individual advice on the appropriate exercise at particular time. The gym offers a combination of boxing and other similar training, and helps people to come to the right level of fitness as soon as they become a part of the team. I would certainly recommend the gym to my friends and colleagues.

Having being there for 2.5 years this club has made an incredible contribution to me; re-shaping my body, losing weight and also building confidence. It has a really warm and friendly atmosphere where you can choose to train from basic to advance level; It offers a variety of classes from light level boxercise to competitive sessions. Highly recommended!

Amazing, i can hardly wait every time i head off to the gym despite knowing full well i'll be exhausted by the end. the camaraderie, the friendliness and hte weight i've lost are testament as to how wonderful this gym is. I couldn't even fit into my 34 jeans, now they're too big for me....haha

Everyone made an effort to ensure that we had a good time and tbh it couldn't have been much better. The electronic scoreboard was clearly visible from all around the ground and the occasional commentary was pleasing to the ear.

Thanks to The Art Gallery﻿ in Ruislip Manor, I believe I'm now son-in-law of the year. With just moments to spare before Diwali weekend, the team helped to frame up an immersive collection of 24 pratimajis from the Jain religion - meticulously carved figures that represent divinity - which my wife and I were able to present to my mother-in-law as a Diwali gift. Just looking at each of these one by one and contemplating on their elevated qualities can be enough to bring about focus and calm in our own everyday lives. The Art Gallery did a fantastic job with the frame, suggested we use a special type of non-reflective glass (which we went for) and kept the original packaging intact so that we could swap it back in the future if we chose to. I highly recommend The Art Gallery in Ruislip Manor - they are a terrific team who are caring, attentive and I get the feeling that they love the work they do. Suraj Shah, Ruislip Manor resident

The Lexi Cinema truly is the archetypal great little place. Along Chamberlayne Road, past the gothic splendour of the Catholic Church of the Transfiguration, is Kensal Rise's Constitutional Club. Its old hall has taken on a remarkable new life. Inside is a gorgeous little cinema. With seats for 40 or so, it's hugely intimate and cosy, but with a sound system installed by the same chap who does U2's tours and crisp digital projection, it's serious about the experience. Dangling from the ceiling is a mesmerising lighting installation by Bruce Munro, fading gently from one hue to another. It's a proper community here – half the audience either know each other or know the Lexi staff, and there's a true feel of locals. Everyone chats before the film. The seats are comfy, with candlelit tables at the front, and each film is personally introduced, harking back to an era where you didn't just go and see a movie, you went out to the cinema. There are often Q&As with directors or added bits of theatre here and there; they even do a night where the New York Met Opera is beamed live to the assembled, black-tied, admirers. What really sets the Lexi apart is its mission. All the profits, from tickets to drinks to popcorn, go to a South African charity called The Sustainability Institute – which means they're probably the only cinema in London which actively encourages you to drink wine whilst watching a film. We'll take that. We won't say more, just go.
