Then followed the most thorough deep tissue massage I have ever had - not for the faint-hearted but you definitely get your money's worth! I felt like a different woman afterwards and, a week on, can still feel the benefits. I thoroughtly recommend this and will definitely go back next time I am in London

I have popped in on my lunch break to Sphere Gallery, did not know there is this lovely gallery in London Spitalfields. My favourite paintings were by Carl BouMansour. On my way out had a lovely chart with the director Ruaridh. I am new to this area and am interested in art, Ruaridh has suggested some websites for me to check out and learn more about the artists. Would recommend everyone to pop in!
What an amazing place!
Very beautiful and enjoyable
Love this place! Always great to go peep new art that is available! Best gallery in and around BrickLane to be honest!

Great park along Regent"s Canal with many different activities. Sports centre, art gallery, climbing wall, etc. Much nicer than walking along the Thames: Take a stroll around regent"s canal from Mile End to Camden. Street art, quirky cafes and cool architecture.
Had a Verri nice sports day there're (my school's one!) (my school is called gatehouse school) ps there is no jim here it's actually at de lezyore centre

Teriffic CrossFit Box. Coaches are all experience, friendly and know what they're talking about. Classes are kept small so your coach can spend more 1:1 time with you. Gym is well equipped, providing gymnastics, ropes classes, strongman classes alongside their CrossFit programme. Have been coming here for over a year and would highly recommend it to anyone. Classes are scaled from absolute beginners all the way to elite and competition standard. There's something for everyone.

I first passed through the doors of crossift in April with really low self esteem and at the end of my rope when it came to working out..I had tried everything from boxing to bikram yoga and after some research i found myself in the very capable hands of Andrew at crossfit London and my life hasn't been the same since...I am now crossfitter who can't get enough of it who is also about 26pounds lighter and for the first time in ages genuinely happy :-D. Everyone here is super friendly and i feel more like I'm part of a family rather than a gym. Crossfitt is way of life and this 'gym' is a great starting point in changing how you feel and what you're able to do with your body.
Great place! Great environment, great coaches and lovely people all round

The facilities are great. All the equipment is still very new and there are an array of classes. For a student gym, it is beyond expectation. It's always really clean too, which is a nice bonus. I'd definitely recommend it. Staff help to create a very friendly atmosphere.
It's clean, well staffed and the classes are great, The gym is never rammed so there's no hanging around queuing for equipment. Good gym for all!
great for walking my dogs
It's a really good cinema. Good screens and awesome sound. The best cineworld in London. They have Real 3D

Really nice, quiet cinema located conveniently close to West India Quay and Canary Wharf Stations. I prefer this cinema to others in the area purely because fewer people seem to know about it so there are rarely queues for tickets and snacks. Prices are standard for chain cinemas. Lovely views of Canary Wharf and 2 minutes walk from a selection of bars and restaurants for pre/post cinema drinks and dinner.

The HMS Belfast is a fantastic day out!! Spend as much time as possible on the ship - I only have an hour and forty minutes here before it closed and it definitely wasn't enough to see everything the attraction had to offer! The tour comes with a free audio guide (unfortunately mine broke halfway through the tour) but visual guides around the ship provided ample information on each room and area of the tour! We had the advantage of visiting on a sunny summer's day and so could truly enjoy the outside area of the tour! I would 100% recommend this to any visitors to London, especially anyone with an interest in history!

This is an awesome piece of history for the Military buffs among you. The ship is in amazing condition for a Second World War Battleship that was instrumental in the sinking of the German Pocket battleship, the Bismark. Admission fee is reasonable and it's an iconic landmark in London that you have to visit.

What a wonderful day out. Such a great place to visit with family or friends and extremely educational. We had a great tour guide who explained things in depth and it's so fascinating to learn more about the war and life at sea during those times. Highly recommend
a very good place for the childrens. you can swim with them, play in the playzone go to the gym and the people is very nice and kind. you must go there!
I had a great time here. The pool is wide and clean. The instructors are nice and polite. And most of all - really helpful.

Super, well-maintained riverside park with fantastic views along the Thames towards Tower Bridge. Lovely spot for relaxing and recreation, picnics and sunbathing, walking and cycling, dog-walking etc. Great pubs and restaurants nearby. Full of beautiful mature trees, new planted areas, varied bird life. Great for kids' games and a good playground area. Fully accessible 24/7 to wheelchairs, buggies. Part of Edward III's Rotherhithe Conservation area and remains of his manor house are adjoining.

It is quite convenient that you can book a class through your phone. I have to go to a fitness club like this one soon, because I've gained weight. I have to lose approximately half a stone by Friday, because I've been invited on an official dinner.

I've been going to the No1 Studio in Tower Bridge for 7 weeks now and I'm incredibly impressed! Everyone is friendly and polite and the studio is clean and well equipped. I'm really starting to see changes now and have just added another 10 personal training sessions to take me up to Christmas. I've met a number of the trainers - who are all impressive, but i'm really getting a lot out of being trained by Jamie Fanning. I've done PT sessions at other gyms, but they feel like a temporary arrangement in terms of my long term well being. Jamie is such a wealth of information and I've learnt so much already that I'm confident this will allow me to make longer lasting life changes. He's a very good motivator and not afraid to push. Very impressed indeed!

I defy anyone not to enjoy training at the Tower Bridge studio! It such a great place to train, feeling like you are training with friends - such a refreshing change from those hideous, large, impersonal gyms. Everyone there makes an effort to learn your name, creating an environment that you want to spend time in. Not only are both the Fitness Slots and 1:1 sessions great (if hard!) work but the PTs genuinely want to help you achieve your goals and target sessions towards your needs and ability. A fantastic find - so glad I made a taster appointment because now I'm hooked!

Really enjoying my sessions at No.1 Studio, training is great and I really feel my strength increasing. Friendly people and a nice clean gym environment - I would definitely recommend this studio to anyone.
Best gym in Tower Hill area. Has everything

As someone who was a member of the Cottons, when that big company took over the personal touch was lost for me. I was delighted that I found this gym, it is well hidden but perfect reach of London Bridge, or Tower Bridge. Im glad i found it I love the pool , area so relaxing..
Great place, have wonderful classes and swimming area.
A lovely park with a sensational view of the Tower Bridge, there is a nice cafe with indoor and outdoor seating.
Fit4Less - Best gym for that price around. What a bargain! Amazing staff and some seriously hot tottie in there. Wouldn't be a member anywhere else.
Definitely worth a visit, if you can find it. Great spot to relax for a few minutes, or enjoy a picnic.
One of the true 'hidden gems' of London - an oasis of peace light and bird song tucked away in the heart of the city's bussle

Great track, being indoors really means you can throw the car around the course, and the electric karts get up to speed so much quicker! Would thoroughly recommend - staff are nice, and the facility is extremely professional.

Excellent place to take some steam off and ease your mind. The last time I was here for an exhibition and my friend and I had a really good time. We felt a bit more educated after we left and we're definitely visiting again.
I loved the crowd and atmosphere, all the Millwall fans were so enthusiastic and passionate for their beloved club.
Best team in London, proper passionate fans, love the club #MILLLLLLLLLLLL

An undiscovered gem! My husband and I absolutely loved it. They had to chuck us out in the end, we would have been there all night. Initially went for the Estuary exhibition but were so taken with the rest of it we stayed the day. We are going to go back because we want to re-visit the Estuary exhibition because we want to soak it up properly, and although we weren't able to do it all in one day we think it might become the kind of place we frequent regularly. It's absolutely fascinating.

Its an excellent day out for children lots of activites for them to partake in. The playground is lovely and the cafe offers a good selection of food for them. The bar also has very nice food and at a reasonable price. children also ate for free which is always a bonus. I would go again
Amazing Place.
Brilliant exhibition, really interesting & very interactive
Always a pleasure to walk/jog along here. The park is full of life - so many birds, squirrels, butterflies and even worms and caterpillars. It is also very well maintained.

Superb facilities at RCT. The level of coaching is amazing and the athletes who attend really do make this Box an amazing place to train and develop. I recommend this place over and over again. Attending RCT isn't like being a member at a standard gym - you become part of a positively growing community.
Great atmosphere, expert coaching, lovely people. Joining is the best thing you'll ever do!

I was visting London for work and decided to go to CrossFit Thames while I was there. Have been to several Crossfit gym in the States is this is definitely one of the best boxes! Clean and a good atmosphere. Highly recommend!
Great people, awesome new space - worth checking out
Excellent place to visit with the kids we love the farm we go all the time.
Absolutely Fabulous
The events are awesome. I have been to a few concerts and I loved them, there are many restaurants and bars that you can choose from if you want to continue the party.
the events there are amazing.
The main advantage of this cinema is its large number of screens. I never came from there without watching at least 2movies.. The overall facilities are good.
Great cinema, friendly staff and set parking lots (with free parking for cinema customers)

Having had laser treatment for reduction of body hair, all I can say is the clinic in Greenwich is amazing! The difference after just a few treatments is pretty spectacular - about a million times better than waxing. Coupled with the fact that Dr Quinn and his team really take the time to answer all your questions and put your mind at rest just makes the whole experience a pleasure! I couldn't recommend the Clinic enough - and have more than a few friends who are now clients and would say the same! S McPhail

I would highly recommend Dr Quinns new Greenwich Clinic to anyone! I was referred to Dr Quinn by a friend, and have had a few procedures at his new Greenwich Clinic. The clinic is great, fantastic location and very relaxed, whilst maintaining a professional approach. Both Dr Quinn and Korti made me feel really welcome on my first visit, and it now feels like i'm visiting friends when I go there! I've recommended Dr Quinn to a few friends and they all had the same brilliant experience. He's a credit to his profession! If you're considering treatments and are a bit unsure, go and see Dr Quinn!
A wonderful experience!
if you like indian food please do come to The Taj Restaurant in 10 Carlton Parade Orpington kent BR6 0JB

They might have low budget in terms of purchasing players internationally but they always look and find ways to improve their team. They have excellent grass root program. The Bobby Moore program is an excellent way of giving hope to people with cancer.This team is to watch out thie 2013 season. COYI!!!
Great stadium! Amazing atmosphere.
it was a great experience and great bunch of fans. west ham fans are the best. up the hammers
beautiful park loved visiting
this is a place of socialising, and lots of fun. everyone is very respectful, and nobody urinates on trees, is also a lovely place to have a picnic, or shape yourself into the world of fitness.

I have had a season ticket for over 15 years now. There has been ups, there have been downs but through thick and thin the fans stay. This is also a great club to take kids to, its super cheap and the fans are respectful.

i live close and I would recommend this park

I like that it is always clean in here and the food is fresh.

Great place. Staff are very helpful. Changing rooms are top notch and all the equipment up to date. very modern and very clean. I have a great time there working out and the equipment are always ussialy free when i go gym. overall a pleasant gym..A gazilion times better than my previous gym (LDG)

An absolutely excellent gym, its recently been refurbed, making it even better. The equipment is up to date & well maintained, the classes are well run and the floor staff and PTs are exceptional, always willing to help and give advice. I woudl highly recommend Virgin Romford....Cheers!!
Surprisingly good setting with interesting exhibts. More than just a local museum. Friendly staff too.
really good very friendly and i highly recommended got cafe ,snacks and drinks

beautiful country park ,lots of wide open spaces footpaths for walking and cycling ,great for dogs and play areas for children-in summer regularly visited by ice cream men,beautifull scenery great for a nice walk in the park or an afternoon out!
a very good skatepark especially that it is for free. Ramps include quater, half, spine, 2 vert quarters, quater to slide, transfer to half x 2, box grind rails and 2 skate ramps.

What a friendly place to train,real professionals one of the best gym's I have ever been too, the one to one training is excellent with people who really know and care about what you are doing, excellent value too. Highly recomended
Have got a very nice cafe. Great cakes
Beutiful and very well maintained.
Beauitful park wuth lovely walks and beauitful lakes. This park is well maintained and the staff / rangers are very heloful.

The home of rugby offers a real experience, especially for the big games that it hosts. For a good value day or two at Twickenham it's worth visiting the London 7s around May time, or the London double header at the start of the premiership season. I'd love to find out what the corporate hospitality is like, especially for a big game :)

HQ - always a great social day out. Bars and food is a bit mental busy at half time so stock up before you go in or send someone out during the game. Bars are often open for a couple of hours after games, and there's a fan village by the west stand that shows other matches. A great day out.

At this stadium you can have a awesome experience including England match days, premiership finals. The best expierence you can have is at the HSBC International sevens series, which is a two day event with fans cheering on a big selection of teams and a different fancy dress theme each year. The RFU shop is also great for all you rugby merchandise. Good transport links and stadium facilities.

We went for a tour in a weekday afternoon and were the only people being shown the stadium and grounds. I loved every minute of it. The tour guide was informative and friendly, we visited the presidents dining room, royal box and locker rooms. All in all a great tour.
A nice gym that operates 24/7 and most of the time is only half full.
Perfect I love to play football there
Wonderful park with excellent well maintained play area. It has a very good padding pool and sand pit.

Usually I prefer to stay wrapped up indoors during winter, but I can highly recommend the Enchanted Woodlands walk through Syon Park at night. Their creative lighting and music displays along the winding paths help to create a truly magical and unique event. Tickets cost £7 for adults and doors open at 5pm. As event closes on the 8th of December, be sure to catch it whilst it's still open!
Excellent food, great and warm service.
Went here on a works Do' and had a great night, would defo recomend it again, Mr Dunne was so helpful, Thanks Michael, for a great night
Beautiful, tranquil nature reserve right at my doorstep. Fantastic!

One of my favourite places in London. Very child friendly, though they aren't allowed to take scooters inside. My son loves the palm house, especially the path around the top. I like the lily house too. The cafe food is simple but decent.

This super nice park is the perfect location to spend a day away from the busy City. The entry fee of about 15 £ is definitely worth it to stroll along the magnificent variety of beautifully arranged plants, trees and flowers. Bring a book and a blanket and enjoy a sunny day out in the nature. Or if you're looking for something exciting do the tree top walk!
Great place for being close with the mother nature!
Loved it. Comfortable and homely (if your home is home to an enormous family with the space to spare!). Small (for a cinema) but perfectly formed.

As a very big fella (I was over 32 stone), it was very difficult for me to swim or train anywhere without feeling conscious about everything. The facilities are not only warm and inviting (as others have said), but the whole team there are so friendly and kind, they make you feel like you are really welcome, that's why I stuck to my regime! Great work and I can't praise the management and staff enough.
Best Yoga school in London, Johnny is amazing and there is a sense of community at the Richmond studio, after the first class you'll wonder how you lived without it.

I had a great experience visiting the new Aquarius Spa today, my treatment was wonderful and the staff are lovely! The spa was beautifully finished and very relaxing. I'd highly recommend visiting Aquarius for all your pampering and beauty needs. I know I will be returning here for all my future facials - it was heaven, I definitely feel like I am glowing!
AN - 4 Jun 2011. What a great experience. An Oasis in Richmond, yet so close to home. Facial, massage and manicure were all excellent. Staff were very attentive. I will certainly be going again!!
Excellent facilities and service. I couldn't recommend Aquarius Spa highly enough.
Great staff, made me feel very welcome and relaxed. Highly recommend the whole team and ditto about the facials!!!!
Facial was fab - excellent!
Great park massive green great childrens play area for all ages and even a running track.
Good facilities and excellent staff
A really beautiful cool little gallery, full of great stuff and really friendly. Really great addition to Twickenham Green. Definately worth a visit

Wonderful place to visit on a rainy afternoon. Beautiful interior, interesting history. Volunteer staff are happy to tell you interesting facts and answer any questions. tea room has a good range of hot and cold food.
The house is only available to view by guided tour, however our guide was witty and incredibly knowledgeable. Well worth a visit.
A great guided tour

Thursday night jazz was superb, Billy, George and Roger made the atmosphere feel like a off-the-fringe Ronny Scott's. And the owners really know what they're doing. This place has great potential! It's going to be amazing when all the refurb is done.
Great food and cozy atmosphere. Won't find sports events on TV here, but really good relaxed place. Food is better and more upscale than typical pub food.
I had the burger. Lovely atmosphere and very comfortable :)

Had my wedding here in september 2013, it was drizzling on the day but the ladies were brilliant, well organised, so helpful it was absolutely fantastic wonderful venue and wonderful team !!! Thank you for the memories xxx

I must say Herbal Lee Traditional Chinese Massage was superb, I really enjoy the atmosphere there. Massage therapist was friendly and very good at massaging my troubled left shoulder. I 'd like to recommend this shop to anyone who want a massage
I highly recommend Dr Li and the practice!

Design Fitness are excellent. They are enthusiastic, knowledgable, supportive, patient and listened to my requirements. They provided lots of encouragement without using the bullying approach to exercise. I have seen great progress and have grown to really enjoy the sessions. I have no hesitation in recommending Design Fitness to other people. I heartily recommend them.
great place for walking dogs watch out for the deer good place to meet people excellent place for a picnic
Wonderful park for family time out.
As nice as Richmond Park! Beautiful place!
Lovely place to go.

This is a gorgeous wild park to run in or for a long, long walk. There are some lovely areas to sit by a brook, the occasional herd of deer, lots of dogs running around and lots of space for everyone to have their own peaceful time there. There's a large parking lot nearby for anyone driving in. The location is great for a long day outdoors, with Hampton Court Palace and the lido nearby.

I was there for a club night with my work mates, and it was an excellent night all round! There were different floors/rooms for different music, and it was all good music. The atmosphere was great as well, with friendly staff and friendly people as well.
always a good time. wicked staff
experienced the nightclub on a student and a mainstream Saturday night and was pleasantly surprised to enjoy myself. would advise goin there again
Excellent value for money. Modern and bright. Lots of equipment..
A great playground with two sets of swings, several climbing frames and a slide. My son loves playing here.
Tony's a positive guy with great ideas. A great listener too. It's always a pleasure to get his pearls of training wisdom.

Riverside Gallery is a wonderful space with a dynamic range of paintings, prints and sculptures. The service is informative and faultless. I throughly recommend you pop in for a brows as the atmosphere is so welcoming. You will definitely leave inspired.

Brilliant football. Champions in most age groups in the surrey league. Friday night five a side leagues. Fantastic tennis and cricket. Holiday courses. three 3g pitches and one 9 a side 3g pitch. Brilliant
Friendly, affordable club. court in great condition.
Really love this spa, the staff is great and friendly and it does not smell of chemical like other nails spa

Best Place to watch Premiership Football. Lovely old ground, great walk through the park along the banks of the Thames and very friendly fans. Ideal place to take your kids for their first experience of a live game. My Dad took me over 50 years ago and I'm still going !

Absolutely phenomenal, life changing experience. I walked past PTbyPT on a regular basis but never thought of joining, until one day I just had enough and wanted to start feeling fitter and getting back into shape. So I started in January 2013 and to date I have experienced a complete change in life style, I have lost a huge amount of weight, changed my look, even had to purchase a new wardrobe. They offer a very personal experience and make you feel as though you are there only client. I have now moved further away from the gym but I still go, it's like a drug. As I keep telling Phillip, PT is addictive. This is the one place where results will show. BEST PLACE EVER!!!!!!
Stamford Bridge is a fantastic football ground. The atmosphere at any game is terrific. Staff are friendly and are happy to help people find their seats. It is well worth going to.
Football Mecca - simply outstanding. Tour is very worth doing. Seeing Chelsea spank United or Arsenal or Spurs even better. Life long fan.

Although I would rather grate my fingernails than suggest I am a fan of Chelsea, I had a nice time at Stamford Bridge. The architecture is magnificent and the fans were friendly. I felt safe in my red shirt amongst the sea of blue fans. Although Man U will always be in my heart, I have fond memories of a great day spent at Stamford Bridge.
Love chelsea n stamford bridge
This cinema is not so big, but I like it. The seats are comfortable and there is enough legroom space. The location is also great - right next to Stamford Bridge. Highly recommend it.

Well what can I say, i went to the opening of the new Embargo 59 last night and it is TOTALLY STUNNING!!! The refurb that has been done is gorgeous, the drinks delicious and the staff particularly good looking!! The new outside terrace is amazing too... cant wait to go back! xx

Absolutely clean, nice and ALWAYS EMPTY. It's jus fantastic,on monday (!) I was alone in the swimming pool and there was only a few persons in the gym! The most amazing thing is that the changing room is clean, clean, clean as a hospital!
Can I just say the Chelsea salon is a real credit to Natalie Gianni and Hannah are amazing too, what a great energy and atmosphere 5 gold stars from me and my daughter. Rebecca and Robyn
Wonderful atmosphere in Putney and Fulham, enjoyed the class and loved the teachers.
Excellent and tasteful collection.

The 5 reasons I recommend Cupcake: • Pleasant atmosphere created by the friendly staff • Opportunity to meet mums in similar situations • A place you could truly feel safe leaving your little treasures in • Top class gym, café, crèche and post natal facilities • Care takers certified with the Pediatric First Aid and experience with young children. Overall it's a really safe, homely environment to leave your children in and a great place to relax.

I discovered Cupcake when I went on maternity leave with my eldest daughter, and what a find! Through the club i have made a great circle of friends, both other mums and staff alike. I now have a son as well and love the quality time and activities i am able to participate in through the club. The club offer such a variety of classes and activities that there is always somethign to entertain both my 2 1/2 year old daughter and 8 month old son. Sometimes I just relax in the cafe - This has all been refurbished recently too which is nice. I also highly recomment the cupcakes! The staff are like a second family to me now, they are always happy and willing to help me organise things. Thanks cupcake!
This is my go to for my sports massage. Charlene is used to working with athletes and knows how to alleviate problem areas. Would recommend her services to anyone without hesitation.

I would just like to say a big thanks you to all the staff in premier laser Fulham. I have sufferd with acne really bad since i was 16, I have had 3 acne peels with premier laser and my skin is amazing now, i have my confidence back. Thanks to my practitioner i have been able to keep up the good work at home as she gave me great before and after care and prouducts. ( Which were very affordable as im a student) And my peels we buy 2 get the 3rd one free so that was really good for me . Thank you

This is a great little nail studio with very professional staff and very close to the tube. They always make my nails look great and this is now my favourite nail studio on Fulham Road. My nails look amazing! I will definitely be visiting Spa Clinique again.
top notch service at a really affordable price will definitely be going back

Have FINALLY got round to writing a review for this brilliant place! Sorry it's taken me so long! I'm a huge fan of Amara Spa and have been for about four years now. Started off just having my waxing done there (where they introduced me to hot wax which makes the whole thing so much less painful). I now have everything done there - nails, facials and waxing. They also do some great monthly deals too and I can never resist those as they are such great value. It's such a gorgeous place and all of the staff are very professional and friendly without being over familiar which I love. Thank you Amara for looking after me for so long - you're awesome! Bobby x

Amara Spa is really THE best for all your spa/beauty needs! I am a regular and have had many treatments at Amara Spa (Yep - I need pampering!) and always receive the same excellent service from the brilliant therapists in a relaxed atmosphere. Very professional and welcoming atmosphere, with private rooms and an extensive list of treatments (Dermalogica) Owner Jackie is running a very good business....

Amazing. Great facilities. Great staff. Great atmosphere. You'd be a fool not to join. Thanks Energie. ;)
Absolutely love this place. I've been going here for a few months now and have gotten quite the variety of treatments here.”

Richmond Park is absolutely breathtaking: a large gem of endless green where you can get lost... and happily so. Regardless of how you navigate through - walk, run, cycle, etc. - you're bound to bump into a "stag party" of beautiful fearless deer that roam so close to you, you can practically touch them. I was in Africa the last time that I found a park so incredible that it nearly rendered me speechless. It's crazy to think that a place that feels so remote and special is just a few tube stops away. If you're from out of town and wondering if it's worth the trip, please know that it is. It will be the highlight!

Great for cyclists. My university society used to do regular rides to and round this fantastic place. Decent tarmac and not too many cars. Great for a spin round if you are in the area and commutable from South Kensington and south west London. Can be a little nippy but once you get going its ok. Fantastic any time of year but particularly enjoyable in Autumn. #12DaysOfChristmas

A v nice & pleasant place - well recommended - v nice & quiet too to retreat from madding crowd - excelllent for those with ltd mobility - Excellent panoramic vus over London!!!' Ease of Parking & gd Parking for the disabled!!!!

love this cinema, always go. good value for money. i have an unlimited card which is good value for money.

Love this gym, have been a member for over a year now. It's great being 24/7 means it always fits into my schedule. Yes it's not got all the fancy shampoos and spa bits but for the price you really can't complain! The gym ive worked out at!!

the perfect place to hide from the hussel and bussel of the london.

Just Love this place, Wouldn't say its better than O2 Cineworld. But I like this place, better than shaftesbury & haymarket cineworld anyday :)

It's a nice cinema with the most comfortable seats ever. The screens are really big and the sound is awesome. They are showing a wide variety of movies and not just the latest blockbusters. Good prices and nice staff.
beautiful gym with great MMA, Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and Muay Thai. Best gym i've seen in london

Very busy place but my kids love it there and that speaks for all! Good choice of snacks and nibbles if you forget to pack your lunchbox :-) Gambado is definitley the most favourite destination of my little ones!
Beautiful store with amazing designer dresses. Every price tag was £600-£700, but it's a stunning store to have a look. Nice dining also at the surrounding cafes.

A wonderful, supportive environment for artists and for learning about art. Highly recommend the classes!
Great place to practise tennis and further more is convenient to have a instructor around you, who by the way there are real professionalists and have the patience to learn you!
Very good party on Sundays.

I found Fybre Fitness hub a few months ago just off Northcote road and found it a great little gym. It's very modern and clean and the equipment and facilities are brilliant. They do a number of different classes to suit all needs including Pilates, dance and mother and babies classes. And if you want sometime more specific they have a fantastic in-house personal trainer, Tom Kelly, who will put you through your paces and help you to reach your fitness goals.

I did the 14 day fat flush and achieved great results in that short period of time. I have become more toned and lost body fat. Dave and Carol really know how to help you achieve your goals with expertise in training and nutrition. If you want to see results, then I would highly recommend Results By Design. Invest in your body, you only get one.
A great place for improving strength, overall fitness, weight loss and learning olympic lifting technique. David and Carol are friendly, very knowledgable and will definitely make you sweat!

First visited back in april 2011. Its a personal training studio and David and Carol really know their stuff if you are looking to lose weight/burn fat. A combination of nutrition advice and strength training is available and they are very reasonably priced too.

I love Kalyana. Everyone who works there is very professional, skilled and tranquil. Although it's not a huge spa, the treatments are always excellent and I always feel and look better immediately. They use great products and I always go back for Cellulite treatments, fake bake tan and swedish massages but it's a new place so I've yet to try more treatments! I'm not yet 20 and I go with my mum who's over 50 so it's safe to say there's something for everyone! I used to go all the way to Knightsbridge to indulge in spa treatments but despite not having a sauna or steam room, I would sooner spend a day at Kalyana than at the Mandarin Oriental.
Great cinema ! The seats are comfortable and the popcorn is always freshly popped and very tasty. The screens are not so big, but the picture quality is amazing. Helpful staff and reasonable prices.

Clapham picture house is awesome, not only do they show all of the new mainly release but they also show most of the independent films. On top of that it is a lot better value for money that your main stream cinemas like the cue or Odeon. You get a much better cinematic experience ans that's not just because you get to drink wine in there. Get there early or order you tickets in advance because tickets sell out quickly.

Found this cinema to be great as it's very conveniently situated for a movie after work! Especially on a Wednesday as they accept Orange Wednesdays! And if that's not enough they allow you to take your alcohol beverage you bought in their adjoining bar into the cinema, the seats are comfortable and the screens are big. One of my favorite cinema's in London.

While we live in Streatham, we always prefer to get the bus down to the Brixton Ritzy rather than the local Streatham Odeon. The people attending stay quiet and all in all it's an enjoyable experience. You can take wine or beer into the cinema as long as you remember to bring the glasses back out. The main screen has real character especially if you are watching a period piece i.e. The King's Speech!

I have tried both private lessons and mat classes. Both are really beneficial and essential to my overall fittness and health. The instructors are passionate about Pilates and making sure you get the best experience possible. I have MS and Harvey has gone that extra mile to make sure that my lessons with him build on my balance and walking skills, without exhausting me. He is able to use both classical Pilates and other relevant training to my benefit. I find Mariana's mat classes particularly enjoyable. I always leave feeling taller, lighter and more centered. I highly recommend both the studio - which is light and airy and efficiently managed - and the trainers/instructors.

My favourite part of the park is the walled garden hidden away so it feels quite secretive. At the end of summer the park also plays host to Lambeth Country Show which is an awesome day out. I Love this park!
Dulwich park is the most fantastic place. The people are nice the park is great and there is so many things to do there!!! My family love Dulwich Park
Great for dog walks, bike rides just a great space in London but feels like the country

Enough could be said about the rarely talked about view of London from the top of the nearby hill, but the Royal Observatory in Greenwich is a great day out for kids and adults with an appreciation for the cosmos. While the Observatory itself is not that big, there are free exhibits and interactive screens, as well as the 120-seat Planetarium – worthwhile viewing if you can afford the ticket. Seeing the Prime Meridian Line makes things a little more real for those who have dealt with GPS coordinates.

Go to the Royal Observatory on the Thames clipper, and spend a pleasant afternoon wandering in the museum at the top of Greenwich hill. A lovely spot to take London visitors as the views into London are cool too, and taking the clipper across the Thames to get there is such a treat!

Greenwich park is huge – I'm been several times and still haven't come close to seeing it all. Make sure that you journey to the top of the hill as you get an amazing view. I love the juxtaposition of the old (Old Royal Naval College) and the new (Canary Wharf) next to each other. Perfect for a picnic on a summers day, especially with treats picked up from Greenwich Market nearby.

This is one of the most beautiful parks in all of London. It covers several acres of land on rolling grassy hills. The rose garden is amazing, the ducks and geese beg for crumbs as you walk by their beautiful ponds and if you are savvy with the trails- you might happen upon the Fallow Deer enclosure-and they are Royally protected by the way! In the fall the chestnuts are ready to fall into your hands and in the winter the hills are primed for sledding after the first good snowfall. I am in love with this park, beauty and fun all in one.

One of the most beatiful place in East London, Although it is not as big as Hyde park, but it overviews Carnary Whalf on top of the hill, also you could visit the old Greenwich college. Sometimes, I like to spend half day on top of the hill, read books, or just seeing the view and think about stuff. It is a great place to see landscape of East London, and may be experience the boat along side Thames river.

the horniman museum in london is one of the most interesting and informative museums i have come across on my travels. museum curators have a knack for engaging the public of london in a way that allows them to explore the diversity within the city using highly accessible means, for example, a recent exhibition titled 'the body adorned' explored the diversity within london through the topic of clothing, tattoos and jewellery. it is truely a space dedicated to exploring the social world around us enhanced greatly by the employment of community groups and guest curators from around the world to interpret object and displays. a trip to the horniman museum will allow the visitor to explore global history and practices through an intercultural lense allowing you to question what you know about other cultural communities. highly enjoyable and highly recommended.

Since I can remember, the Horniman Museum has been a special place for me. A treasure on our doorsteps, I think it can often be overlooked by many in the borough. I have vivid memories of spending what seemed like hours staring through the glass at all sorts of stuffed animals that I'd never seen before - the animals were a lot bigger when I was six years old! Then as I got older I'd be taken there on school trips to study more about our current class projects such as Anicent Egypt and biodiversity. Not many children are fortunate enough to have such an important cultural resource like the Horniman Museum anywhere near them. I last visited the Museum during the summer last year during the build-up to the London Olympics to see 'The Body Adorned: Dressing London', an exhibition which explored the question of what we wear and why. It proved to me how London embraces diversity and that different cultures, however distinct, complement each other in this city and make us richer people. I would recommend going to visit for a long day during the weekend in July/August when you can enjoy a variety of events which take place in the Gardens, like classical concerts and latin dance performances - a great way to end a trip to the museum!
A wonderful green space with 360 degree panoramic views over london and looking south towards Kent.

This gym and swimming pool has recently benefitted from a huge refurbishment, meaning that it's shiny, clean and all the equipment is brand new (TVs in the treadmills!). If you are looking for a corporate style gym with a pool, steam room and sauna etc etc. Look elsewhere. If you are looking for a local gym with friendly, helpful staff, a good range of equipment and machines as well as free weights (downstairs) then this is an ideal place. I have had a great experience at this gym - staff are friendly and dedicated. Most members (even the few muscle heads!) are pleasant welcoming and friendly. There is a very unique community/family feel among staff and members, The studio has regular classes (the usual: spin, pilates, yoga, zumba) and are free to members. When the studio is not in use, it is additional space for members to use. There are also regular social events occasionally at the gym and occasionally in the local area. Personal training is available. For what it is (a neighborhood gym) and for the price and membership deals, this is an excellent place. However, not a huge corporate style health and fitness center, so if you want and can afford that, go pay for the additional but unnecessary extras! All the essentials are here for you to get a good workout and experience and meet your goals.

Interesting to see how internet gets into our life these days, even Kumon has its own websites. My best mate's little Johnny is currently studying at Beckenham centre, I have to the centre once to pick up his boy. I am not good at Maths at all, but I am impressed by the little one's times table skill.

As the retiring Kumon instructor for this study centre, having established the Kumon programme in both the Beckenham and Crystal Palace areas, I wish the new team every success in their quest to build upon the legacy they have inherited from us. Together with the instructors at Forest Hill and Bromley we have seen the reputation of Kumon grow from very modest beginnings over the course of some 20 years (17 of these being at The Azelia Hall in Beckenham). Many enjoyable years have passed since we opened our first Kumon centre from our living room, during which time we have had the privilege of watching so many students grow from children into assured, talented adults. We look forward to hearing of their great deeds in life!

Sunny morning in Japan! Kumon started in Japan 60 years ago and is now very popular in five continents, so I will say no more. Beckenham instructor is one of my best friends and we met and worked in an international company for years. I can see Kumon's shadow from him. It was actual myself who told him about the Kumon programmes and he was so interested, now he ended up running a Kumon centre. I wish him all the best and I am convinced that with his solid education and teaching background, his Beckenham centre will be doing very well.
Being parent of a student in Kumon Beckenham, I now understand the importance of numberboard and times table practice in and out of Kumon class. And trust me they really work and help.

I have 2 children studying at the Kumon Beckenham, both are now at the top tables in their class. Also just heard good news from another parent that his son passed 11+ exams at a leading grammar school thanks to Beckenham Centre.

Uno dei locali più affascinanti di tutta Roma. Un vero e proprio salotto della nightlife romana, ideale per passare piacevoli serate. Musica commerciale, gente selezionata, ottimi i cocktail. Il locale è stato di recente ristrutturato, elegante e ben studiato nei minimi particolari.

My friends and I, mostly six or more, enjoy this very much because the gardens are so perfect to talk and read in. Then, to come to the inside, well, it is a marvel! We like to study Art and sometimes find that an Artist who hangs here also hangs in some of our Parents homes. For myself, I see one painting from five hundred years ago, and I look like him, very much so, and this is because he is a relative! Some things never change, it seems!

Ho svolto il corso base in questa scuola di fotografia e mi sono trovata benissimo; Gilberto è una persona professionale, alla mano e trasmette un grande entusiasmo. Il corso mi ha fornito soprattutto le basi tecniche per fare qualche scatto migliore dei miei viaggi e dei miei lavori, finalmente!

Scuola di fotografia in uno dei quartieri più chic di Roma! La scuola è diretta da Gilberto Maltinti, eccezionale maestro d'arte, preciso e organizzatissimo, un vero professionista. Se volete imparare seriamente le principali tecniche fotografiche, questo è l'indirizzo giusto. Consigliatissimo! ;)

Gilberto, da solo, vale tutto il prezzo pagato per un corso di fotografia. Persona carismatica e simpaticissima, insieme al suo collaboratore Lorenzo riesce a rendere in maniera estremamente semplice concetti che a volte possono risultare un po' ostici. Completano il quadro la massima disponibilità nei confronti delle esigenze degli allievi, qualità alquanto rara. Se volete imparare divertendovi, affidatevi a loro senza pensarci due volte.

E UM LUGand most beloved attractions, although I will start off saying it wasn't my cup of tea. It is good seeing the ruins of such an old building which has survived this long, however it can be seen in an hour. I have to admit since I was on the Rome Segway Tour before we were shown videos of how it was built and looked like, so probably taking away the surprise of the Colosseum. Qui al MACRO di via Nizza verrà ospitato dal 4 Ottobre al 1° DIcembre 2013 l'evento principale della dodicesima edizione di FOTOGRAFIA - Festival Internazionale di Roma con il tema "Vacatio". Oltre alle esposizioni di grandi fotografi di fama internazionali verranno ospitati in questa struttura anche giovani italiani, un bookshow per le case editrici indipendenti, workshop e lectures.

Absolutely wonderful hotel in the heart of Rome. Everything about our stay there was perfect - the room, the service, the food, the location. Among many delights of the hotel are the complimentary minibar, the free wifi in the room not just in public areas, the excellent breakfast, the rooftop restaurant, the lounge area with free coffee and tea. When we return to Rome its it's the place we will stay for sure.

Eugenio è un grande personal trainer e una grande persona. Mi alleno con lui da 2 anni e grazie ai suoi programmi ho trasformato il mio fisico e migliorato la mia salute in generale. Le sue sessioni sono dure e intense, ma ne vale decisamente la pena. Non posso che consigliarlo a tutti.

Grazie ai suoi metodi ho perso 5 kg in un mese e mezzo, sono molto più tonica e credo che non ci sarei mai riuscita senza di lui. Un posto che merita la considerazione e il sostegno di tutti, romani e turisti. L'atmosfera è di grande accoglienza, sono andata subito a vedere la tomba di Gramsci, avevo letto un articolo sul giornale in cui avevo visto che una signora aveva preso ad occuparsene. E' bellissima. E' stato emozionante, ma anche le tombe degli sconosciuti. E' toccante.

En el sector de Testaccio, y situado cerca de cruces de avenidas caracterizadas por un tráfico infernal, el cementerio acatólico es un oasis de paz y belleza. La densidad de tumbas de poetas y otros artistas famosos es impresionante. John Keats, el corazón de Percy Shelley, las cenizas de la actriz Belinda Lee, los restos del gran Antonio Gramsci, así como del escritor de la "beat generation", Gregory Corso, yacen en este cementerio. Éste es una joya en el corazón de Roma, y para muchos constituye un gran descubrimiento.

è un cinema con molte anime: - è un cinema di primavisione, con la qualità ed il confort adeguato e soprattutto con i titoli del grande cinema popolare e i blockbuster internazionali (qui lo scorso 9 gennaio Will Smith e Rosario Dawson hanno presentato al numerosissimo pubblico del quartiere il loro Sette Anime) ed un'attenzione particolare ai film per bambini e famiglie; - è un cinema di ricerca e d'essay, attento alla produzione indipendente europea e internazionale, ai titoli provenienti dai festival di tutto il mondo, con uno spazio costante per i documentari, i cortometraggi, la sperimentazione (qui Bertolucci a presentato ai tantissimi presenti il suo La Rabbia di Pasolini) - è uno spazio da vivere, con il foyer dove si svolgono mostre fotografiche e presentazioni di libri e film, ma anche dove la sera si ascoltano dj-set e sound-machine; e ancora con il bar, il wi-fi, la libreria. Insomma il Nuovo Cinema Aquila è il primavisione del quartiere Pigneto, ed è contemporaneamente il cinema d'essay di tutti i romani.

ALBAKIARA CENTRO ESTETICO E SOLARIUM, mette a disposizione esperienza nella sfera del benessere e dell'estetica, in un ambiente caratterizzato da un'atmosfera tranquilla e confortevole dove profumi, suoni e colori, danno vita a un luogo esclusivo. il Centro è specializzato nei trattamenti corpo come fangoterapie, anticellulite, pressoterapie con macchinari all'avanguardia. il Centro Estetico offre massaggi: circolatori,con oli essenziali,al cioccolato, relax, linfodrenanti,bendaggi riducenti... Offriamo trattamenti di estetica come pedicure estetici e curativi, manicure e pulizia viso. Trattamento viso: antimacchie,anti-age, anti-acne e altri ancora. Epilazione per uomo e donna. Inoltre siamo specializzati in ricostruzioni. Unghie. Per finire abbiamo a disposizione 1 doccia solare,1 trifacciale e 1 esafacciale. Venite a fare un Check-Up Gratuito ti sapremo consigliare pacchietti e trattamenti personalizzati!!!

Mi sono avvicinato per caso a questa palestra, cercavo un luogo in cui allenarmi, crescere tecnicamente, prevalentemente nel campo dell' arampicata, e fare un po di sano fitness...ad oggi sono più di 3 anni e non ho mai pensato di cambiare palestra, questo perchè l'ambiente, in tutte le discipline proposte , è sano ed allegro, così come lo sono le persone che, come me vivono, tra il lavoro ed urgenze e cercano un po di trague almeno in palestra. Si crea è creato sicuramente un legame, si fidelizza il cliente e questo è un aspetto anche economico da tenere inconsiderazione. Cosiglio vivamente di provare questa palestra sia per le sue cospicue attività offerte sia per la possibilità di incontrare nuovi amici in un ambiente molto,molto sereno.
